member.name: T:XNAForms.Forms.DockStyle
member.summary: Indicates how controls dock to their owners.

member.name: F:XNAForms.Forms.DockStyle.NONE
member.summary: Indicates that a control should not attempt to specially dock to its owner.

member.name: F:XNAForms.Forms.DockStyle.LEFT
member.summary: Indicates that a control should attempt to dock to the left side of its owner.

member.name: F:XNAForms.Forms.DockStyle.TOP
member.summary: Indicates that a control should attempt to dock to the top side of its owner.

member.name: F:XNAForms.Forms.DockStyle.RIGHT
member.summary: Indicates that a control should attempt to dock to the right side of its owner.

member.name: F:XNAForms.Forms.DockStyle.BOTTOM
member.summary: Indicates that a control should attempt to dock to the bottom side of its owner.

member.name: F:XNAForms.Forms.DockStyle.FILL
member.summary: Indicates that a control should attempt to fill up the space provided by its owner.

member.name: T:XNAForms.Forms.Panel
member.summary: Groups collections of controls together, and allows for two scrollbars as well.

member.summary: Represents a visible object on a form.
